literals: "A fully-qualified type name, that is used to find matching type references. "
"Supports glob expressions. `java..*` finds every type from every subpackage of the `java` package."
"Whether to include implicit type references, such as those in method signatures."
"Check whether a type is **not** in use"
"Useful as a precondition to skip over compilation units using the argument type."
